WRITING.TEXT: This is one of the coolest uses for a spent cake I #8217;ve ever seen! Thank you for the inspiration
What kind of plant is that might I ask? And did you break up the cakes or just add them whole? I #8217;m Donna do this every time now!!!

WRITING.TITLE: [Technique] Reusing Spent Cakes
WRITING.TEXT: [Technique] What ways have you all come up with to use spent cakes? Can you use them to inoculate new jars? Can you use them to spawn into a mono tub after a dunk? Have you put them in potted plants? Interested to see what to do once these are done! Thank you! Happy Growing #127812;

Thank you for this idea! I am in an apartment setting, so porch ideas for that? I have about another year where I #8217;m at so putting the effort of an outdoor garden near me is a lot! Again thank you!
I just started using cakes to fruit my potted succulent plants, working on posting the entire experiment! Epic work!
This is absolutely amazing #128591; #127995; I aspire to this level!
I have penis envy cakes next to them in the chamber and they have been sooooo slow, just pinned for First Flush while the mazas are on their second flush
I pulled it off and it was just a weird abort, looked like one anyways! Thanks for the tip!

I don #8217;t know about mixing the strains like that! I have separate strains on the cakes and the cakes are in the same environment! But let me know how that goes... I don #8217;t think they will make hybrids like that...
My average varies on my water content in the substrate! These babies took about 2.5 weeks to colonize the pint jar and then 5 to begin fruiting
Waiting until FULL colonization allows the mycelium to fortify and strengthen... I birthed my penis envy cakes to soon also could be a cause of the slow to no growth issue
Coco Coir and Vermiculite at a 65/35 ratio with maybe just a little too much water Also looking into polyfill instead of micopore tape because it #8217;s getting a bit too humid in there

WRITING.TITLE: [Technique] Spore Prints from Penis Envy
WRITING.TEXT: Does anybody have experience in taking spore prints from penis envy? I can #8217;t quite get any of mine to open up? Thank you #128591; #127995;
I have one set up right now for that #128591; #127995;
